issues.description: The problem statementâ€™s Part 2 description mistakenly says each PersonController method takes a Consumer<List<Note>>, but both the template and solution signatures use Consumer<List<Person>>. This mismatch between the described and actual parameter type can confuse students about the correct consumer type.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the problem statement text to refer to Consumer<List<Person>> for the PersonController methods instead of Consumer<List<Note>>.
